titles.title: Preserving Access to Medicaid for Americans Act of 2016
To amend titles XIX and XXI of the Social Security Act to eliminate the CHIP maintenance of effort requirement and to eliminate DSH cuts for States not implementing the ACA Medicaid expansion.
Preserving Access to Medicaid for Americans Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Preserving Access to Medicaid for Americans Act of 2016
This bill amends titles XIX (Medicaid) and XXI (Children's Health Insurance Program) (CHIP) of the Social Security Act to eliminate: (1) certain Medicaid payment reductions with respect to states that did not implement Medicaid expansion under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, and (2) specified maintenance of effort requirements with respect to CHIP.
